Text: The Vitamen:  The band's three members were frontman Jesse Blockton, bassist Matt Hyans, and drummer Dave Rozner, all of whom attended the same high school in Mamaroneck, New York.

<Text: The Vitamen:  In December 2004, the band released their third album, "Children of the Bear">

Text: The Vitamen:  It was recorded in a house in Cape Cod with the band's producer, Bo Boddie.
